name: Old School Hero
description:
Download standalone files for full experience!

Android, iOS, Mac & Linux versions also available for download!

Are you nostalgic about old music? Do you think music these days sounds like broken dishes scratching against a blackboard made of human teeth?

Then you've come to the right place!

Challenge yourself! Play awesome music and headbang your boredom away!

Instructions

Use your keyboard to play notes. Check the controls in the Options menu.

You can also rewind when you mess up! Be careful though, only 3 seconds of rewind per song!

Add your own songs and create your path to victory! 

(Only in standalone version! Download standalone files for full experience!)

Browser version 

Fewer functionalities, but just as fun!

The browser version is a bit finicky and weird. The rewind functionality is buggy.

Download standalone files for full experience!

Credits

Menu model - Mixamo

Music:

Queen - We are the champions

Metallica - One

Menu Background Music - Muz Station Productions (Unity Asset Store)

Trumpets - FunWithSound (FreeSound.Org)

Vinyl Rewind - Isaac Ionescu (FreeSound.Org)

Skyboxes - Borodar (Unity Asset Store)

Font - Tiny Worlds (Unity Asset Store)
